title: chat ban
body: so, i got a 9 game chatty banny thing....which means i can only type to my team every 4 mins and no all chat.....i understand that i received this for calling my support a retard and being slightly aggressive....but i was jhin adc, and i had a heim support.......who didnt play support, who stole cs, fed and then left my lane at lvl 3. my mid laner who had less kills and more deaths, and the top laner who also fed decided to report me completely ruinied my next game as i was unable to communicate with them.....riot..pls.....this is not a band i deserve....wtf do i do other than lay 9 bot games to make me play league comfortably...cmon guys.....

replies.body:
The fact that you had a trolling Heimerdinger support does not give you a "free pass" to insult people however you like. You are judged by your actions alone, and in this case they were toxic.

If you want to know what you should do now, I recommend you focus on just communicating only essential information through the chat. The whole point of a chat restriction is to give you an opportunity to learn self control when situations get tense. Calling people "retards" and being "slightly aggressive" doesn't help you win games and just makes the game less enjoyable for everyone else, therefore you should avoid it at all costs.

Good luck with your reforming, lemme know if you have any questions :D
yeah dude, agree to every point there. just super tilted and being childish at the time aye. deserved the chat ban. still on that hon grind now, lvl2 stylin ;)
